description:
I met this person on discord,  he offered me to setup my trading setup with axiom. He told me to download the extension uxento.io (a tracker). I did that I opened the extensions at my axiom screen. I didn't connect anything or imported any seed phrases or private keys, and I didn't show any sensitive information. Then he said he needed to call a friend. And then I saw my 1 SOL was gone.

I didn't connect anything or imported any seed phrases or private keys, and I didn't show any sensitive information. Then he said he needed to call a friend. And then I saw my 1 SOL was gone.

Amount lost

The following sites have been reported by users as potentially fraudulent. These links are provided for reference and investigative purposes only, not as endorsements.
